guidance.title: Reading Tips
lines: Tarot is not about predicting the future‚Äîit reflects the energy around you and highlights possible directions.
Try asking open questions such as ‚ÄúHow can I‚Ä¶?‚Äù or ‚ÄúWhat could I do‚Ä¶?‚Äù to invite more insightful guidance.
If you are new, begin with the offline basics, learn the card meanings, then explore AI readings when you feel ready.

draw.title: Draw Your Cards

subtitle.ai: After drawing, take a mindful breath to form a spiritual link with the cards. Drag each one to its position‚Äîwhen the connection is felt, the spirit guide reveals itself and the AI delivers your personalized reading.
subtitle.offline: After drawing, take a mindful breath to form a spiritual link with the cards. Drag each one into place‚Äîwhen the connection is felt, the spirit guide appears and the tailored interpretation unfolds.
